code: import axios from'axios';import{calculateInsAge}from"../utils/common";import dayjs from"dayjs";export const getAmt=async params=>{try{let date=dayjs(params.toDate).diff(dayjs(params.fromDate),'days');let age=Number(calculateInsAge(params.birth));let gender='';if(params.gender==='male')gender='M';if(params.gender==='female')gender='F';let param={date:date,birth:age,gender:gender,type:params.pdtCode,count:1};const res=await axios.post('http://43.200.21.215:5000/api/join/primeumCalc',param,{});return res.data.amt.toString().replace(/\B(?<!\.\d*)(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g,',');}catch(e){console.log(e);return{data:[]};}};
